$(“#recordBtn”).hide(); $(“#pauseBtn”).show(); $(“#clearBtn”).hide(); playbackInterruptCommand = “”; }, function(){ //on playback end $(“#playBtn .ui-btn-text”).text(“Play”); $(“#playBtn”).show(); $(“#recordBtn”).show();
